item.title: Employee Social Proactivity Analysis - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop a two-phase system that first collects and aggregates data from public Discord channels, then uses analytics and LLMs to evaluate employee social engagement patterns, providing insights into community participation and impact.
